mapper.update: UPDATE SCHOOL SET SCHOOL_NAME = #{SCHOOL_NAME}, SCHOOL_MAJOR = #{SCHOOL_MAJOR}, SCHOOL_DEGREE = #{SCHOOL_DEGREE}, SCHOOL_OF_START = to_date(#{SCHOOL_OF_START},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), SCHOOL_OF_END = to_date(#{SCHOOL_OF_END},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), SCHOOL_CREDIT = #{SCHOOL_CREDIT}, SCHOOL_MAXCREDIT = #{SCHOOL_MAXCREDIT}, SCHOOL_EXPLANATION = #{SCHOOL_EXPLANATION} WHERE SCHOOL_SEQ = #{SCHOOL_SEQ} AND SCHOOL_MEMBER_CODE = #{SCHOOL_MEMBER_CODE}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SCHOOL WHERE SCHOOL_SEQ = #{SCHOOL_SEQ} AND SCHOOL_MEMBER_CODE = #{SCHOOL_MEMBER_CODE}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHOOL WHERE SCHOOL_MEMBER_CODE = #{SCHOOL_MEMBER_CODE}
